title: Converse CONS SPACE 001 BCN: Art
description:
On Saturday 18 May 2013, Converse took over a disused section of the Port of Barcelona to create the first CONS SPACE, an initiative to transform disused urban space through skateboarding, art and music. 

Local artists Txemy Basualto, Fernando Elvira, Rubén Sanchez and Adrián Blanca collaborated with Converse skaters Kenny Anderson and Pontus Alv to design a skate spot inspired by the abandoned industrial materials and incredible location.
